subject: Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Earl Clark returned from a one-game suspension to post his seventh double-double of the season with 11 points and 12 rebounds Thursday as host Louisville defeated West Virginia, 63-54.
snippet: Earl Clark returned from a one-game suspension to post his seventh double-double of the season with 11 points and 12 rebounds Thursday as host Louisville defeated West Virginia, 63-54.
